title: Ticket #7276: Allow overriding of automatic constraint in the job router
description:
The job router adds the following clauses to the constraint expression of every route: 
(target.ProcId >= 0 && target.JobStatus == 1 &&
(target.StageInStart is undefined || target.StageInFinish isnt undefined) &&
target.Managed isnt "ScheddDone" && target.Managed isnt "External" &&
target.Owner isnt Undefined && target.RoutedBy isnt "<job-router-name>")

Farrukh Khan at Fermilab would like to be able to modify this expression to allow an in-place route to be applied to held jobs.
remarks:
2020-Mar-11 10:31:38 by tannenba:
DUNE would like this policy:

  1. If held due to memory, release with grace memory.

  2. If held due to wall time, release with grace wall time.

  3. If held due to wall time after already being released due to memory, release with grace memory and wall clock time.
